comments:
Hi,

I use Eclipse 3 to debug a java application. However when I
execute a specific line of code I always get the following
error box: "Unable to create part:". And that's all.
The above string doesn't tell me the editor's
name. Instead I get an empty editor window after I close the
box with red text within it: "Unable to create editor"
This editor window doesn't have a title.

I have found a similar bug report: bug number is 75074.

Here's the .log-output:
